item.title: Leetcode SQL Interview Answer
item.description: 178 Medium SELECT Score, DENSE_RANK() OVER(ORDER BY Score DESC) ‘Rank’ FROM Scores Please know the difference between DENSE_RANK() and RANK()

item.title: Leetcode SQL Interview Question
item.description: RANK() & Window Function 178 Write a SQL query to rank scores. If there is a tie between two scores, both should have the same ranking. Note that after a tie, the next ranking number should be the next consecutive integer value. In other words, there should be no “holes” between ranks. +—-+——-+ | Id | Score | +—-+——-+ | 1 | 3.50 | | 2 | 3.
